title: Franklin County: Jubal Anderson Early to Edmund Jennings Lee II, September 26, 1872
summary: Jubal A. Early writes to Edmund Jennings Lee II about the burning of Montgomery Blair's house during Confederate incursions into Maryland and Pennsylvania. Early acknowledges responsibility for burning places like Chambersburg, PA, but denies that he had anything to do with the burning of Blair's house.
keywords: Battle Description, American Civil War, Home Front, State Government
